tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE environmental_impact_assessments ( 
  assessment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
  project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
  location VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, 
  assessment_date DATE NOT NULL, 
  impact_description TEXT 
)

CREATE TABLE permit_requirements (
	permit_id INT,
	issue_date DATE,
	expiration_date DATE,
	issued_by VARCHAR,
	permit_type VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE environmental_impact_assessment (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    assessment_date DATE,
    assessed_by VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    assessment_result TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE project_permits (
    id INT,
    project_id INT,
    permit_id INT,
    permit_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES environmental_impact_assessment(id),
    FOREIGN KEY (permit_id) REFERENCES permit_requirements(requirement_id)
);
